Package com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PulseCachesDirectoryAware
    Allows a plugin to be given a directory to store data in, currently located within Pulses _caches directory, but could change in future releases.
    PulseChainEventPlugin
    All chain event plugins should implement this interface via one of the listener sub-interfaces.
    PulseChainFinishedEventListener
    Plugins that implement this interface will receive a notification when a chain finishes.
    PulseChainPluginService
    Allows a plugin to get some details about a chain plugin, such as a displayable name.
    PulseChainPluginServiceAware
    Plugins implement this interface if they want to be able to get information about Pulse chain plugins.
    PulseChainQueuedEventListener
    Plugins that implement this interface will receive a notification when a chain is queued.
    PulseChainRunService
    Allows a plugin to get details about a chain run.
    PulseChainRunServiceAware
    Plugins implement this interface if they want to be able to get information about Pulse chain runs.
    PulseChainService
    Allows a plugin to find out about chains.
    PulseChainServiceAware
    Plugins implement this interface if they want to be able to get information about Pulse chains.
    PulseChainStartedEventListener
    Plugins that implement this interface will receive a notification when a chain starts.
    PulseCommentEventListener
    Plugins that implement this interface will receive a notification when a comment is made on a review.
    PulseConfigDirectoryAware
    Allows a plugin to be told where the config directory is for Pulse.
    PulseEmailBuilder
    Used to create emails that will be sent using PulseEmailService.
    PulseEmailService
    The email reporter allows experts to report email messages.
    PulseEmailServiceAware
    Implement to receive the PulseEmailService instance to use to create emails and ask for them to be sent.
    PulseEventPlugin
    Base interface for the event plugins.
    PulseInstanceInfoAware
    Allows a plugin to receive information about the instance of Pulse cluster it is running in, effectively the Pulse DB this pulse is connected to.
    PulseReviewEventPlugin
    All review event plugins should implement this interface via one of the listener sub-interfaces.
    PulseReviewStateChangedEventListener
    Listener interface called when a review state changes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PulseChainEventPluginException
    Base exception for the chain event plugins to throw.
    PulseChainNotFoundException
    Requested chain could not be found in Pulse.
    PulseChainNotQueuedException
    Requested chain could not be queued to run.
    PulseChainPluginNotFoundException
    Requested Chain Plugin details could not be found.
    PulseChainRunNotFoundException  
    PulseEmailNotSentException
    The email could not be sent for some reason.
    PulseEventPluginApiException
    Base exception for the event plugin api.
    PulseReviewNotFoundException
    Specified review could not be found.
